short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension that will change your life in so, so, so many ways.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all instances of the word "so" on every website you visit with multiple "so"s. The upper and lower limits can be set in the options menu, and Scholzly can be easily disabled (also through the options menu). Enjoy!
